document_data.name: Marble
document_data.mainbody: '''Marble''' was a [[hardstones|hardstone]] widely used in the Realms as a building material.{{Cite dragon/72/Gems Galore|20}} Marble was sometimes called '''[[wikipedia:en:calcite|calcite]]''' because that was its primary ingredient.
document_data.Description: Marble was highly prized in construction because of its strength, weight, and beauty. It came in many colors, including black, gray, pink, and white, and polished to a reflective smooth finish. This material was extremely heavy but was easy to quarry to exact specifications. A typical price was 3 gp per pound (0.45 kg).

Usages.Powers: No magical use for marble has been found.

document_data.Trivia: The lesser deity [[Vhaeraun]] was known to occasionally send black marble to show his favour or disfavour to his followers.{{Cite web enhancement/Deity Do's and Don'ts|15}}
